data.message: Created Lore CRM dark mode dashboard demonstrating great lighting principles: (1) layered shadows with geometric progression for depth, (2) edge lighting via border-top with #FFFFFF08 for light source indication, (3) dark mode elevation through surface brightness (#0A0A0B → #141415 → #1C1C1E), (4) glow effects on status indicators using color + 50% opacity shadows, (5) color-matched icon backgrounds at 15% opacity. File: msj-directions.pen, node: OCavt
